summary: Completed testing of cart operations for GAZ MAN e-commerce app. All cart CRUD operations (add, view, update, delete) are working correctly both via API and UI.

issues: Product images show technical drawings/blueprints instead of gas cylinder images - images are not relevant to the gas cylinder e-commerce context

action_items: Consider updating product images to show actual gas cylinders instead of technical drawings
seed_data_creation: Created test users during testing with unique UUIDs
context_for_next_testing_agent: Cart deletion is working correctly. The user-reported issue of 'deleting items from shopping cart is not working' could not be reproduced. Both backend API (DELETE /api/cart/items/{product_id}?size=medium) and frontend UI delete button work correctly. The confirm dialog 'Retirer cet article du panier?' appears and after accepting, the item is removed from cart. Full workflow tested: register -> add to cart -> view cart -> delete item -> verify empty cart.
rca_of_the_issue: Unable to reproduce the reported bug. Cart deletion works correctly via both API and UI. Possible causes for user's original issue: 1) Browser caching issue, 2) Network connectivity problem, 3) Session expiration, 4) User may have dismissed the confirm dialog instead of accepting it.
